name: 2Good2Die
description:
2Good2Die

Controls

You can move with both WASD and ZQSD 

Use the arrows to shoot in four directions but be careful : when you shoot upwards, it shoots down and when you shoot on the sides it shoot the other way too.

How is it related to the theme ?

The game relies on multiples of 2. For instance, you can only kill a specific enemy if  theres 2, 4, 6, 8 etc enemies of the same kind in the room ! Then all of them die and the score increases.

If you shoot randomly on monsters you score will decrease.

So shoot wisely :)
